remarks:
Restricted quantifier version ~ 19.41v .  Version of ~ r19.41 with a dv condition, requiring fewer axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2003.) Reduced dependencies on axioms.  (Revised by BJ, 29-Mar-2020.) 

---

 Restricted quantifier version of Theorem 19.41 of [Margaris] p. 90. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2003.)
statement:
r19.41v $p |- ( E. x e. A ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( E. x e. A ph /\ ps ) ) $.
$d ps x $.
